content:
Hey Foodies,

You all have been asking me for buttercream, Here it comes!


Buttercream,

Everyone has their own recipe, but it all starts with a base recipe right? A mix

of butter and hefty amount of sugar is blended to an extend when its airy, fluffy, light, and creamy. Thats what is Buttercream Icing or Frosting is..




Make this and share your awesome creations with me :)

)

 

That’s it for today, Hope to hear from you soon

Thanks for stopping by,

CookingShooking is on YouTube, Facebook, Google+, Twitter,!
author: Yaman Agarwal
recipeNotes: For storing, cover and refrigerate/freeze. For defrosting, take the buttercream to room temp then beat it really well to make it creamy, if needed add some cream and beat.
title: Buttercream Recipe

steps.text: In a mixing bowl, add in the butter and beat it really well using a electric mixer.
Once its creamy, add in 1/3 of the sugar and beat it until well combined. Repeat the same with the next two additions.
Once all the sugar is well mixed, beat it really well for a couple of mins. Do not skip this, we need the mix to be extremely well beaten before adding any liquid.
Add in vanilla and about 1/2 tbsp cream and mix well. If the mix stays thick and needs more cream, add more. Beat for another 5 mins.
Use it as required or store and use later.
